author: James Kampas
text: The Cabazon Dinosaurs are a popular roadside attraction visible from the 10 FWY about 16 miles west of Palm Springs. The 150-foot-long Brontosaurus and 65-foot-tall Tyrannosaurus are best known for their appearance in the 1985 film “Pee-wee's Big Adventure.” #peeweeherman #SoCal https://t.co/H2qXVd2QQo

author: James Kampas
text: We took a stroll around @SunnylandsNews today and the palo verde trees made it especially beautiful. Described as the “Camp David of the West,” the former Annenberg Estate has hosted 8 US presidents, royalty & other world leaders since it was built in the mid-1960s. #RanchoMirage https://t.co/C4BGf7wBPW

author: James Kampas
text: We spent hours Wednesday exploring the HUGE Getty Center and checking out the featured exhibition “Poussin and the Dance.” @GettyMuseum is a great place to take out-of-town guests if they want to see some of the best art, architecture, gardens, and views in Los Angeles. #museums https://t.co/XgHKrxRtTU

author: James Kampas
text: The Spadena House, commonly known as the "Witch House," is very unique among the large mansions of Beverly Hills. It was built in 1921 for a movie studio and moved to its current location in 1926. Had fun showing it to the grandkids yesterday. #Hollywood #architecture #fairytale https://t.co/KHTvde4ZQR

author: James Kampas
text: Violin soloist @JamesEhnes dazzled the audience tonight with his performance of Tchaikovsky’s "Concerto for Violin and Orchestra" and a caprice by Paganini as an encore. Maestro St. Clair and @PacificSymphony did a fantastic job with Dvorak’s "New World Symphony!" #classicalmusic https://t.co/RXgDKVGtDB

author: James Kampas
text: The Big Horn lambs we saw this morning are so cute! #sheep #wildlife #mammals #cuteanimals #SouthernCalifornia #CoachellaValley #PalmSprings #desertmountains #desertlife #animals #conservation #TwitterNatureCommunity #wildlifephotography #naturephotography https://t.co/ElEZQl24oX

author: James Kampas
text: Watching violinist @JoshuaBellMusic play Bach’s Violin Concerto in A minor sent chills down my spine; tonight’s awesome concert by the Academy of St Martin in the Fields included Barber’s Violin Concerto and Beethoven’s “Eroica.” @McCallumTheatre #classicalmusic #chamberorchestra https://t.co/Qd9JJYoKFf

author: James Kampas
text: It was a gorgeous day to attend the "2022 BNP Paribas Open" at the Indian Wells Tennis Garden. Plenty of good, free seats were available for the women’s qualifying matches. The tournament concludes on March 20th. #tennis @BNPPARIBASOPEN @IndianWellsTennisGarden #TennisParadise https://t.co/oxk39eAYyb

author: James Kampas
text: The @SanDiegoSymph concert last night began dramatically with Andrew Norman’s “Drip Blip Sparkle…,” followed by 2 trumpet concertos (Neruda & D’Rivera) featuring prominent trumpeter @pacho_flores. Tchaikovsky’s Symphony No. 4 finished the evening. @rafaelpayare #classicalmusic https://t.co/xrpRNdQ5R0

author: James Kampas
text: Went to a wonderful recital tonight @McCallumTheatre with renowned violinist Pinchas Zukerman & accompanying pianist Shai Wosner playing sonatas by Mozart, Beethoven, Schumann and Brahms. Presented by Palm Springs Friends of Philharmonic. #classicalmusic #chambermusic #PalmDesert https://t.co/I9OcETSR48

author: James Kampas
text: This Northern Mockingbird may look kind of plain, but his songs fill my backyard with the sweetest and most soothing sounds... #songbird #wildlife #birds #SouthernCalifornia #CoachellaValley #desertlife #TwitterNatureCommunity #birdphotography #birdwatching #birding #BirdTwitter https://t.co/8IJvlPGtzV

author: James Kampas
text: Saw two beautiful, young Big Horn Sheep while we were hiking this morning. #wildlife #mammals #SouthernCalifornia #CoachellaValley #PalmSprings #desertmountains #desertlife  #animals #conservation #TwitterNatureCommunity #wildlifephotography #naturephotography https://t.co/KjHrMRjcrY

author: James Kampas
text: It was so cool visiting the "Coachella Valley Wild Bird Center" in Indio on Sunday and getting to hold this amazing little burrowing owl. This non-profit organization does great work. #wildlife #birds #owls #naturelover #desertlife #wildliferescue #animals https://t.co/PSHHHHwHxR https://t.co/Evn6aFlm7J

author: James Kampas
text: Another great concert tonight at the McCallum Theatre. Orpheus Chamber Orchestra & saxophonist Branford Marsalis jazzed things up a little with works by Rossini, Debussy, Ibert, Turina, and Courtney Bryan. I especially liked Jacques Ibert’s “Concertino da Camera.” #classicalmusic https://t.co/eDr71ZYTzC

author: James Kampas
text: BRAVO to Conductor Vasily Petrenko & the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra! Tonight’s performance at the McCallum Theatre was superb! Elgar and Britten were on the program and I really enjoyed pianist Olga Kern’s performance of Grieg’s “Piano Concerto in A Minor.” #classicalmusic #art https://t.co/eOWVkf4JJ8

author: James Kampas
text: Happy National Bird Day! @audubonsociety @KeyWestWildlife #NationalBirdDay #birds #wildlife #nature #animals https://t.co/1siwOJMwqt

author: James Kampas
text: Attending Saturday’s performance of all 6 of Bach’s Brandenburg Concertos by The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center was a sublime holiday experience! Presented by the Philharmonic Society of Orange County at the Segerstrom Center for the Arts. @SegerstromArts #classicalmusic https://t.co/duuojHbU9V

author: James Kampas
text: Just one of many hot-air balloons I spotted around the area this morning as the “7th Annual Cathedral City Hot Air Balloon Festival” continues this weekend. #PalmSprings #CoachellaValley #foodtrucks https://t.co/qrElNexg5F https://t.co/HmasR808fE

author: James Kampas
text: There are a lot of really cool classic and exotic cars for sale this weekend at “McCormick's 71st Palm Springs Classic Car Auction,” at the Palm Springs Convention Center. #VisitPalmSprings #automobiles #oldcars #funcars https://t.co/rKdY9VZ7iV https://t.co/8m8FRUvV68

author: James Kampas
text: Many of the golf courses around here have good restaurants with great views that are open to the public (including non-golfers). Today we saw 3 roadrunners at Cimarron Golf Resort’s “On the Rocks” Restaurant in Cathedral City. #PalmSprings #desertlife #CoachellaValley #California https://t.co/jGHbITQKgM

author: James Kampas
text: I was surprised to read that the small “loggerhead shrike” I saw this morning on the Art Smith Trail, includes lizards, small mammals, and other birds in its diet. #carnivorous #PalmDesert #CoachellaValley #California #photocapture #birdwatching #nature #wildlife #birdphotography https://t.co/vy8XzSMo3z

author: James Kampas
text: It was cloudy and cool this morning in Laguna Beach, but it’s so beautiful there we enjoyed walking around anyway. #California #OrangeCounty #coastalliving #gloomyday https://t.co/nSuFmH14nW

author: James Kampas
text: The San Diego Symphony, under the baton of music director Rafael Payare, sounded wonderful last night at The Rady Shell at Jacobs Park. Mezzo-soprano Michelle DeYoung sang Mahler’s “Lieder eines fahrenden Gesellen” exquisitely! @MJDY @rafaelpayare @SanDiegoSymph #classicalmusic https://t.co/vD1deYGLgJ

author: James Kampas
text: Glad the hot temps are gone, so I can sit outside again and enjoy the beauty of nature. #CoachellaValley #PalmSprings #backyard #hummingbird #orangeflowers #wildlife #birds https://t.co/8BTCeXm5Ag

author: James Kampas
text: Excited to be a new patron & subscriber to Palm Springs Friends of Philharmonic’s 2022 Season @McCallumTheatre. P.S.F.P. has been bringing world-class symphony orchestras to the Coachella Valley for nearly 50 years. https://t.co/TaHzapzf8w #PalmSprings #classicalmusic #desertlife https://t.co/diZyDTjQYb

author: James Kampas
text: Young pianist Victor Shylyakhtenko gave a very fine performance of Chopin and Liszt pieces tonight, at Coachella Valley Repertory in Cathedral City. Mr. Shylyakhtenko is a “Waring International Piano Competition” prize winner. @VWIPC @CVREP #classicalmusic #piano #music #mazurkas https://t.co/ayhzyMtUo7

author: James Kampas
text: I haven’t been to the Getty Villa Museum in years and I’m so glad we went this week. The gardens are beautiful, the antiquities are amazing and the featured “Mesopotamia” exhibitions are fascinating. @GettyMuseum #LosAngeles #art #architecture #gardens #archeology #ancienthistory https://t.co/GySe4dcy7O

author: James Kampas
text: I had a wonderful Fathers Day with my elder daughter that included dinner and an outdoor performance of the Paul Taylor Dance Company @MusicCenterLA. It felt so good to be attending a live show again! #DanceAtDusk #moderndance #ballet #performingarts https://t.co/rs0KoHi1hn

author: James Kampas
text: This young verdin I just saw in my backyard is so cute! #PalmSprings #California #photocapture #birds #birdwatching #nature #wildlife #birdphotography  #BirdTwitter #birding #NaturePhotography https://t.co/f9UT2HhyKG

author: James Kampas
text: Had a very nice bike ride this morning on the “Ventura to Ojai Valley Bike Trail.” The temps were good and we saw (and heard) a lot of small critters along the way. #Ojai #Ventura #California #outdoors #nature #wildlife #bicycling #birds https://t.co/lVHMNSzara

author: James Kampas
text: I love the brilliant, red-orange color of this cactus flower that bloomed overnight. #backyard #desertplants #desertlife #colorful #naturalbeauty #nature #plants https://t.co/aRkDeW8MA4

author: James Kampas
text: Saw this little Chipping Sparrow today at Whitewater Preserve; love his little red cap. #photocapture #California #birds #birdwatching #nature #wildlife #birdphotography #BirdTwitter https://t.co/D7OACpivrz https://t.co/xz920E6nr7

author: James Kampas
text: This really “cool” outdoor art installation won’t melt when the temps hit 120 degrees this summer.  “Popsicles” was created by artist John Cerney and sponsored by the Palm Springs Public Arts Commission. #pspublicarts #desertlife #colorful #fun https://t.co/A9UvUdXR2o

author: James Kampas
text: Desert X 2021 is coming to the Coachella Valley on March 12. This HUGE sign that’s going up (based on the famous Hollywood sign?) is one of the many outdoor installations that will be on display through May 16. #PalmSprings #art #indianland https://t.co/KLHKGrVwEL https://t.co/baM76L0xzs

author: James Kampas
text: My hike this morning on the “Cactus to Clouds Trail” was a steep climb that took me high above the City of Palm Springs. #California #SanJacintoMountains #hiking #desert #nature #mountains #outdoors #adventure #views https://t.co/DhlVjzMyav

author: James Kampas
text: I REALLY miss going to concerts at beautiful venues like the historic Auditorium Theatre in Chicago. @AuditoriumChgo #PerformingArts #SupportTheArts #COVID19 #EndThePandemic #GetVaccinated https://t.co/ncXPoy4VL9

author: James Kampas
text: Noisy is ready to play. Happy #Caturday! #SaturdayMorning #catlover #CatsOfTwitter https://t.co/Xevhy6xiBA

author: James Kampas
text: This Mearns coyote was standing on the side of the road in @JoshuaTreeNPS and it looks like he's smiling at us. @ProjectCoyote #nature #wildlife #desert #animals #canine #cuteanimals #wildlifephotography https://t.co/bz7Ogt4Pdn

author: James Kampas
text: A Brown Pelican flying over California’s largest lake, the Salton Sea. The Salton Sea is largely unusable by humans, but it does provide an important sanctuary for migrating birds. #SavetheSaltonSea #PacificFlyway #nature #environment #environmentaldisaster #birdwatching #birding https://t.co/Tx05138WfJ

author: James Kampas
text: Salvation Mountain is a unique folk art experience located in the California desert, about a 90-minute drive southeast of Palm Springs. It was the longtime project of local resident Leonard Knight who passed away in 2014. @folkartsociety #SlabCity #SaltonSea #roadtrip #desertlife https://t.co/FR91GzQEN4

author: James Kampas
text: I’m glad there’s snow on the mountains here as we go into the new year. #RanchoMirage #SantaRosaMountains #ChuckwallaTrail #CoachellaValley #PalmSprings #hiking #desertlife #nature #littlethingsinlife https://t.co/ZgWIrHGUfR

author: James Kampas
text: The yellow cottonwood trees are beautiful today at "Big Morongo Canyon Preserve," in Southern California’s “Sand to Snow National Monument.” #SanBernardinoMountains #MojaveDesert #desertlife #hiking #outdoors #naturephotography https://t.co/X61P7cG7h8

author: James Kampas
text: I’m fortunate to have so many beautiful trails nearby to hike on, especially with the gyms closed. Today I explored the “Pushawalla Palms Trail” in the Coachella Valley Preserve.  #California #PalmSprings #desertlife #nature #oasis #hiking #outdoors https://t.co/6aVYyMY2Mt

author: James Kampas
text: Watching "Jeopardy" after dinner every night has been our tradition for many years, this is such sad news. R.I.P. Alex Trebek. https://t.co/wt1zILkYUX

author: James Kampas
text: It’s a cool, sunny morning in Palm Springs and I’m out riding my new RadRover 5 electric bike from @RadPowerBikes. It’s a lot of fun and great exercise! Keep building that bike path @CV_Link, the Coachella Valley needs it. #ebike #cycling #desertlife #smartmobility #healthyliving https://t.co/Xro0cBhQ31

text:

author: James Kampas
text: I listen mostly to classical music these days, but I’ve attended a lot of non-classical concerts over the years too, and these ticket stubs I’ve kept represent just a small number of them. #music #punkrock #classicrock #ticketstubs #concerts #livemusic https://t.co/rHzHnnWizB

author: James Kampas
text: The Huntington Library & Botanical Gardens in San Marino, CA, is a gorgeous place to spend time. They’re doing a great job of keeping it safe. The library and art galleries aren’t open, but the gardens are definitely worth visiting. @TheHuntington #LosAngeles #Pasadena #flowers https://t.co/J2l0MbnL8c

author: James Kampas
text: Saw this California Scrub Jay and many young Desert Cottontails today @JoshuaTreeNPS. #birdwatching #desertwildlife #birds #nature #bluebird #birdTwitter #wildlife #birdphotography #TwitterNatureCommunity #SouthernCalifornia #rabbits #desertlife https://t.co/cWsmvZ13md https://t.co/02ATAAgwxH
